metadata.title: CVE-2015-8346 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: app/views/timelog/_form.html.erb in Redmine before 2.6.8, 3.0.x before3.0.6, and 3.1.x before 3.1.2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation about subjects of issues by viewing the time logging form.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
